date.description: The date of the value: day in `Y-m-d` format, month in `Y-m` format or "Total" for the first element of the list which shows the total values for the whole requested period

order_count.description: The order count in the aggregation period

costs.description: Product fulfillment, digitization, branding, shipping costs and taxes that are charged by Printful

profit.description: The difference between Sales and Fulfillment. If retail price data is not available, profit might be negative
